description: CSS file that defines styles and theme variables for the application, including light and dark theme colors, component styles, and animations.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with center alignment and theme-dependent background color.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the application logo, including animation effects.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header for the application, styled for responsiveness and theme adaptation.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application, responsive to theme colors.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button styles for toggling theme, including hover and active states.
